Title: Provides for the seizure and forfeiture of vehicles, vessels and aircraft used in counterfeit goods
Summary: Provides for the seizure and forfeiture of vehicles, vessels and aircraft used in counterfeit goods; establishes this shall not apply to vehicles, vessels, or aircrafts that are used by any person as a common carrier in the transaction of business as such common carrier.
LawCode: Add Art 166 ยง166.00, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to the seizure and forfeiture of vehicles, vessels and aircraft used in counterfeit goods
